summary: The purpose of this study is to investigate the efficacy of a new means for producing an innactive vaccine against the pathogen Salmonella enterica subsp. enterica serovar Gallinarum (SG) for safe use in chickens younger than six weeks.

use_cases.case: The complete genome for Salmonella enterica subsp. enterica serovar Gallinarum str. 287/91, represented by the accession AM933173, was leveraged by the authors because this dataset was returned as a result of a BLAST analysis carried out to identify species showing high similarity with the recently sequenced 07Q015 strain of the same organism. Strain 287/91 was mentioned by the authors as the best hit of all results returned.
